product_name: INDIE LEESoothing Cleanser with Rosa Damascena
summary: SummaryIndie Lee Soothing Cleanser gently washes away makeup and impurities. Formulated with the "Queen of All Oils" Rose Damascena and Roman Chamomile, this moisturizing cleanser nourishes and smooths, leaving skin silky soft.
details: DetailsBenefitsMoisturizing cleanser that gently washes away makeup and impuritiesHydrates and soothes dry, sensitive skinGently exfoliates to plump and help smooth skin textureSkin is left silky soft and appears smoother in texture and tonePrinted on FSC certified paperGreat for all skinKey IngredientsRosa Damascena and Roman Chamomile hydrate & soothe the appearance of rednessOat Kernel Oil calms, soothes and moisturizes dry, sensitive skinGlycerin helps plump skin appearancePHAs (Polyhydroxy Acid) hydrate & gently exfoliate to plump and help smooth skin textureFormulated WithoutAlways formulated without 1,300+ banned ingredients, including: Parabens, Mineral Oil, Sulfate-based detergents, Synthetic Fragrance, Petroleum-based ingredients, Phthalates, Phenoxyethanol, Formaldehyde and GMO ingredientsItem 2580595How To UseMassage a quarter sized amount onto wet skin and rinse thoroughly to reveal a fresh face. Use morning and night for best results and follow with the rest of your ritual.Precautions: For external use only. This product is formulated with Glycerin and may contain Soy.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Propanediol, Avena Sativa Kernel Oil, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Gluconolactone, Carrageenan, Rosa Rubiginosa (Sweet Briar Rose) Seed Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Rosa Damascena (Damask Rose) Flower Oil, Citronellol, Geraniol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Massage a quarter sized amount onto wet skin and rinse thoroughly to reveal a fresh face. Use morning and night for best results and follow with the rest of your ritual.Precautions: For external use only. This product is formulated with Glycerin and may contain Soy.
ingredients: Rosa Rubiginosa (Sweet Briar Rose) Seed Oil

reviews.headline: Pricey, a bit smelly, but good otherwise!
reviews.comments: So to start off with, I have rosacea-sensitive skin but since the ingredient everyone keeps talking about is dead last in the list, it didn't bother me. YMMV. I will say the smell takes some getting used to. But it does what's on the packaging - cleanses and leaves my skin super soft. I'm only switching because of the cost.

reviews.headline: Contains geraniol— a known skin irritant!
reviews.comments: If you have genuinely sensitive skin, don't use this. I have rosacea and a history of perioral dermatitis. I thought this would be great for my skin. I should've researched the ingredients more, because now I'm stuck with a red blotchy face. I know it was this product because it's the only change I've made. I'm disappointed that Indie Lee would include ingredients that are known to cause skin sensitivity in her products. I'll have to find something else to address this.

reviews.headline: Read about Geraniol if sensitive.
reviews.comments: All the ingredients are good. Nothing concerning except for the Geraniol. It's ok if your not sensitive. However, if you're prone, it can cause an allergic reaction. It's normally used as a natural repellant for a lot of insects.

reviews.headline: Incredible cleansing experience, great outcome
reviews.comments: This has a lovely texture and amazing natural chamomile scent. It's been amazing for my rosacea.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have super sensitive skin that can often react to most cleansers. I had no issue with this one and like the way my skin feels after use. I would only rate 4 stars because I personally do not like the smell and wish it had less fragrance like most sensitive skin products do to prevent irritation. I also wish that it came in a trial size to test out first - although I know that this is a relatively new product so a trial size may come later. I would still say that it is worth the try to anyone looking for a good sensitive skin cleanser!
faceoff_positive.headline: Great for Sensitive Skin

faceoff_negative.comments: If you have genuinely sensitive skin, don't use this. I have rosacea and a history of perioral dermatitis. I thought this would be great for my skin. I should've researched the ingredients more, because now I'm stuck with a red blotchy face. I know it was this product because it's the only change I've made. I'm disappointed that Indie Lee would include ingredients that are known to cause skin sensitivity in her products. I'll have to find something else to address this.
faceoff_negative.headline: Contains geraniol— a known skin irritant!
